level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 9 of District of Columbia Poverty Lawyer Loan Repayment Program Emergency Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16-512, October 25, 2006, 53 DCR 9086).
For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 9 of District of Columbia Poverty Lawyer Loan Repayment Program Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2006 (D.C. Act 16- 563, December 19, 2006, 53 DCR 10259).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 4-1701.01.
